page.title: 15Farming year, Prickwillow
page.content: {Mr S. Rice}told us about the Farming Year. 'At the beginning of{July}we are busy maintaining the Ditches, irrigating the Crops and repairing the Farm Machinery ready for Harvesting, as we have our own workshop. We employ 5 men and I help when I'm needed. I spend a lot of time in paperwork and keeping up with new farm ways. We start harvesting Wheat in{August and in{September}we harvest the Onions. In{October}we Harvest the Potatoes and start on the Sugar Beet. From{October_December}we plant Winter Wheat before the ground gets too hard. We then work in the big stores grading Potatoes and Onions. {Spring}comes we plant out the Sugar Beet, Peas, Onions and Potatoes. Sometimes we will need to spray weedkillers and add Manganese in{May, June & July.}We can go on our Holidays in July.
